mapper.sql: id,create_time,execute_time, execute_user, status, conclusion, keep_plan_id, non_execution, non_execut_cause, keep_order,carry_day,form_code,note,end_time,delay_user,delay_time,start_time,keep_photo, keep_time,mould_id,keep_type,injection_molding_id
mapper.select:
SELECT t8.* FROM ( SELECT t13.*, t11.audit_idea, t11.audit_user, t10.audit_result, t10.audit_status, t12.path FROM ( SELECT t1.id, t1.execute_time, t1.execute_user, t1.STATUS, t1.conclusion, t1.keep_plan_id, t1.non_execution, t1.non_execut_cause, t1.keep_order, t1.create_time, t1.carry_day, t1.form_code, t1.note, t1.end_time, t1.delay_user, t1.delay_time, t1.start_time, t1.keep_photo, t1.keep_time, t1.mould_id, ifnull(t3.keep_type,t1.keep_type) AS keepType, t3.NAME AS keepTeamName, t4.CODE AS mouldCode, t4.NAME AS mouldName, t1.injection_molding_id FROM fw_mould_keep_task t1 LEFT JOIN fw_mould_keep_plan t2 ON t1.keep_plan_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN fw_mould_keep_team t3 ON t2.keep_team_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN fw_mould_devices t4 ON t1.mould_id = t4.id GROUP BY t1.id ) t13 LEFT JOIN fw_jbpm_execution t10 ON t10.data_id = t13.id AND t10.form_code = t13.form_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT max( t7.id ) id, t7.execution_id FROM fw_jbpm_hist_task t7 GROUP BY t7.execution_id ) t9 ON t10.id = t9.execution_id LEFT JOIN fw_jbpm_hist_task t11 ON t11.id = t9.id LEFT JOIN fw_basic_attachment t12 ON t13.keep_photo = t12.data_id ) t8 WHERE 1 =1 and IF(t8.status = 2, t8.audit_result != 1 and t8.keep_plan_id IS NULL, (t8.audit_result in (0,1,2) or t8.audit_result is null) )
AND t8.mouldCode LIKE concat( '%/', #{mouldCode}, '%' ) ESCAPE '/'
and t8.keep_order like concat('%/', #{keepOrder}, '%') ESCAPE '/'
and find_in_set (t8.status,#{taskStatus})
and t8.audit_result = #{auditStatus}
order by t8.id desc

select t1.*,t2.id as executionId, t5.`name` as keepTeamName,t5.keep_type as keepType, group_concat(t6.code) as mouldCode from fw_mould_keep_task t1 left join fw_jbpm_execution t2 on t2.data_id = t1.id and t2.form_code = t1.form_code left join fw_mould_keep_plan t4 on t1.keep_plan_id = t4.id left join fw_mould_keep_team t5 on t4.keep_team_id = t5.id left join fw_mould_devices t6 on find_in_set(t6.id,t4.mould_devices_ids) where t1.id = #{id} group by t1.id,t2.id,t5.`name`,t5.keep_type

SELECT t8.* FROM ( SELECT t13.*, t11.audit_idea, t11.audit_user, t10.audit_result, t10.audit_status FROM ( SELECT t1.id, t1.execute_time, t1.execute_user, t1.STATUS, t1.conclusion, t1.keep_plan_id, t1.non_execution, t1.non_execut_cause, t1.keep_order, t1.create_time, t1.carry_day, t1.form_code, t1.note, t1.end_time, t1.delay_user, t1.delay_time, t1.start_time, t1.keep_time, t1.mould_id, t3.keep_type AS keepType, t3.NAME AS keepTeamName, t4.CODE AS mouldCode, t4.NAME AS mouldName FROM fw_mould_keep_task t1 LEFT JOIN fw_mould_keep_plan t2 ON t1.keep_plan_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN fw_mould_keep_team t3 ON t2.keep_team_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN fw_mould_devices t4 ON t1.mould_id = t4.id GROUP BY t1.id ) t13 LEFT JOIN fw_jbpm_execution t10 ON t10.data_id = t13.id and t10.form_code = t13.form_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT max( t7.id ) id,t7.execution_id FROM fw_jbpm_hist_task t7 GROUP BY t7.execution_id) t9 ON t10.id = t9.execution_id LEFT JOIN fw_jbpm_hist_task t11 ON t11.id = t9.id ) t8 WHERE 1 = 1 and (t8.audit_result = 1 or t8.audit_result is null)
AND t8.mouldCode LIKE concat( '%/', #{mouldCode}, '%' ) ESCAPE '/'
and t8.keep_order like concat('%/', #{keepOrder}, '%') ESCAPE '/'
and find_in_set (t8.status,#{taskStatus})
and
find_in_set(#{item},t8.execute_user)
and date_format(t8.execute_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{executeTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by t8.id desc

SELECT t3.id, t3.create_time, t3.NAME, t3.content, t3.deleted, t4.path AS webPath, t4.NAME AS fileName, t4.suffix FROM fw_mould_keep_item t3 LEFT JOIN fw_basic_attachment t4 ON t3.instructor = t4.data_id WHERE FIND_IN_SET(t3.id,(SELECT team.keep_item_ids FROM fw_mould_keep_team team WHERE id = ( SELECT t2.keep_team_id FROM fw_mould_keep_task t1 LEFT JOIN fw_mould_keep_plan t2 ON t1.keep_plan_id = t2.id WHERE t1.id = #{id} ))) AND t3.deleted = 0

select t1.*, t3.keep_type as keepType from fw_mould_keep_task t1 left join fw_mould_keep_plan t2 on t2.id = t1.keep_plan_id left join fw_mould_keep_team t3 on t3.id = t2.keep_team_id where t1.id = #{id}
select count(0) from fw_mould_keep_task where keep_order = #{order}
select t1.*, t2.audit_result as auditResult, t2.id as executionId from fw_mould_keep_task t1 left join fw_jbpm_execution t2 on t2.data_id = t1.id and t2.form_code = t1.form_code where t1.id = #{id}

select fmkt.* from `fw_mould_keep_task` fmkt left join `fw_mould_keep_plan` fmkp on fmkp.id = fmkt.`keep_plan_id` where CONCAT(',',mould_devices_ids,',') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mouldId},'%') and fmkp.`status` = 1 and fmkt.`status` = 4 and end_time <= #{nowTime} order by fmkt.`end_time` desc limit 0,1
